taskbody.prereq:
To deploy your generated code, you need an active T24 environment in your Server view and the
Project Build Automatically
selected in your workspace. Your project-models's settings has appropriate selection of artifacts to be generated. For more information about the artifacts, please refer to Project Properties .

step.cmd: Apply a Generate Code on one of the following in the Project Explorer view pane:

choices.choice: If you want to generate code for all files in the project, right-click on the project. .
If you want to generate code for all files of a specific folder, right-click on the folder.
If you want to generate code for a specific file, right-click on the file.

result.p: For any model type but Services, generated files end up in the -gen project in the folder: src/xml-t24i . If not already available, the Console view pane is opened, logging XML files deployment.
